phrases: From the first time I saw you, I think.
I do not think I knew,
So it... was all a dream, then?
but you will still catch a cold if you fall asleep out here.
This would not have happened without Tanigawa-san.
She helped me realize how I felt.
I wonder if Tanigawa is still under the weather.
I cannot let everyone see me like this.
You should not worry about it.
You do not look that differ
I told everyone you had a summer cold.
Well, that is good at least.
Well, we have known each other forever.
I have not told anyone, so do not worry about it.
I am about to make lunch.
We went to the same grade school,
but this is the first time we have been in the same class, huh?
I am Kanna Tanigawa, nice to meet you.
We are in the same class again?
I just cannot get rid of you, can I?
You took the words right out of my mouth.
We have known each other since we were kids.
Nice to meet you, Mio Kitahara-san.
Nope, I know the name and face of every girl here.
I do not know whether to be impressed or think you are an idiot.
Cannot you just say I am a gentleman who is also a feminist?
It took a long time, you know.
I was going to see Kanna.
She does not want to spread it.
She would not let me see her, either.
So you were at Kanna's place, then.
We have known each other forever, after all.
I made cake for her, and I would hate to see it go to waste.
Oh, I thought I would sort out some of these films.
So it is been piling up...
Does something have to be wrong?
That is not what I meant.
Do you not like me like this?
So you two are a couple now, huh?
Wh-What are you going on about?!
This is a present from me to you.
Treasure this miraculous joining of two souls well.
Your cake is really good, Mio.
Yeah, but that is the only thing I have got in my favor.
But it is good you have something.
You have things going for you, too.
You are tall, you are handsome,
you are good with your hands...
You are good at remembering the faces and names of girls.
I would not say that is in my favor.
Is it okay if I ask you something difficult?
Why did you invite Takatsuki-senpai to make a movie with us?
Because it seemed like that is what Kai wanted.
I never thought she would say yes, though.
You knew how Kanna felt, did not you?
You are so close to her.
I noticed, so I am sure you noticed, too.
If Senpai and Kirishima-kun ended up getting closer...
I said that was not it.
I just wanted to support Kai, so I asked her.
And if Kanna joined us in making the movie, too,
then I thought she would be able to get closer to Kai.
I did not know how it would turn out.
I just wanted to help both of them out.
Then what happens to your feelings?
Where are your feelings for Kanna going to end up?
I have been watching you this whole time, so I know.
You have only been focused on Kanna.
Why do you lie to yourself?
Time is not going to solve everything if you keep avoiding the problem.
You are the one who told me to just say what I want to say.
That is why I tried to be brave for once.
I told you I did not need an answer back then,
but will you tell me now?
We are all going to have fun filming that movie over summer break.
We will make the movie, and show it at the school fair.
And I will just keep being the usual Kanna Tanigawa.
That is what I have decided.
What am I supposed to do?
Would you like to go take a walk to cool off a bit?
Since it is been a while...
I thought it would be really nice here at night.
There is so much nature still around.
My first time coming to this planet,
yet it is almost like I can remember seeing all of this.
I would like to help you find that place of yours, if it is okay?
If I could help you out, even a little
Sure, that is why I originally came to this planet...
Actually, I just wanted to go on a trip.
I did not really have a reason.
I just thought I wanted to do something.
I wanted to start something using this.
I thought, If I could just put something together...
I guess we were the same.
That makes me want to help grant your wish even more.
Right now, I want to be with you.
I want to make the movie with you and everyone else.
That is my wish right now.
Nothing in this world lasts forever.
Cannot tell him because you are an alien?
And you cannot be with him because you cannot stay here forever?
Are you going to use that as an excuse to just keep running from him?
That was the best thing to do.
Now Kaito-kun will get what he wants.
You have not said anything since you got back home.
You know, that is your problem.
Nothing's going to fix itself if you keep quiet.
You cannot just keep acting cool.
You might look like you are doing fine day by day,
but I know you are just a kid at heart.
You are here because you left your husband.
I just ran away for a while.
Basically, I still have a home.
A fight between wife and husband can take many forms.
But you have not even gone out with a girl,
so I do not think you would understand.
Man, it reeks of virgin in here.
I had to wait all that time.
And so she just leaves again?
I want to start filming again the day after tomorrow.
Oh, I will tell everyone about that when we actually meet in person.
That is why I need to talk to everyone.
And tell them how I feel.
Now I should be fine for tomorrow's shoot.
Why did you call me out here?
I am supposed to be getting over a cold.
You are not all swollen up anymore.
We came here a lot when we were in kindergarten.
I was taller than you back then.
And now look how much taller you are.
And you always saved me from getting bullied.
Why are you acting so creepy?
Actually, you did not just call me out here to talk about the past, did you?
Hey, what happened to your foot?
If you want to say something about Kaito-kun, do not bother.
If you do not need anything else, I am going home.
I thought everything would be fine if things worked out between you and Kai!
But I did not want to see that happen!
So then I ended up being stupid,
hoping that if Kai and Senpai hit it off,
you would be open to whatever.
I played with the heart of the girl I like, only to make her cry.
And now I cannot do anything about it!
My mind's already a mess and now you decide to tell me this?!
I know the timing's really bad.
But I was finally able to get it off my chest.
I know you really like Kai, do not you?
Kai likes Ichika-senpai, but that does not change anything, does it?
And that is what I liked about you.
Why do you get to say all that stuff, and look all happy that you got to?
D-Do not touch a girl's hair like that!
I am not going to cry.
Actually, it is not fair of you to come here.
You can do a lot when you are in love.
I was able to change because of you.
No, I can at least think about changing,
about being stronger, because of you.
That is what I want to say to you.
I have liked you for a long time now.
Let us work on that movie.
Even if nothing in this world lasts forever,
But I still want to stay on this planet.
There is a lot on this planet I care about.
Remon-senpai said we would be filming a lot until this evening.
I wonder how much longer all the filming will take.
I think we will still finish by the end of summer break.
Do you know how worried I was about you?!
Onee-chan, why did you come to Earth?
I bet she came to give us her blessing.
It is too early for that!
